manager_bullets.text: Led migration of payment service to Kubernetes, completed one month earlier than expected
Reduced deployment time from 2 hours to 15 minutes, as per KPI
Mentored two junior engineers, with positive feedback from them and successfull upskilling
Sometimes misses deadlines when overloaded, due to capacity issues. Communication MUST improve.

draft:
## Successes
- {employee_name} led the migration of the payment service to Kubernetes, completing the project one month ahead of schedule.
- {employee_name} successfully reduced deployment time from 2 hours to 15 minutes, meeting the established KPI.
- {employee_name} mentored two junior engineers, who provided positive feedback and demonstrated successful upskilling as a result of {employee_possessive_pronouns} guidance.
- {employee_name} has designed and presented the roadmap for DevOps automation, to senior IT leadership, with positive feedback.

## Misses
- {employee_name} has occasionally missed deadlines when overloaded, primarily due to capacity issues.

## Challenges
- {employee_name} faces challenges with workload management, which has sometimes impacted the ability to meet deadlines. Also, {employee_name}'s knowledge of SRE and security best practices is limited.

## Performance rating and discussion
- Overall, {employee_name}'s performance is rated as "Exceeds expectations." {employee_name} has demonstrated strong technical leadership and mentoring abilities, as well as a commitment to improving key processes. However, there are areas for improvement in communication and workload management.

## Strengths
- Technical leadership, as demonstrated by the successful and early migration of critical services.
- Process improvement, particularly in reducing deployment times to meet KPIs.
- Mentoring and upskilling junior team members, with positive outcomes.

## Development Areas
- {employee_name} should focus on improving communication, especially when facing capacity constraints, to ensure better alignment and timely delivery.

## Feedback
- {employee_name} is encouraged to continue leveraging {employee_possessive_pronouns} technical expertise and mentoring skills. Improving communication and proactively managing workload will further enhance {employee_possessive_pronouns} effectiveness and impact within the team.
